title: Network Intrusion Detection and Response
description: A cybersecurity analyst must respond to an alert indicating a potential advanced persistent threat (APT) actor on a classified network.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alert and analyze the associated network traffic data to confirm malicious activity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms the presence of anomalous traffic patterns consistent with an APT.

tasks.description: Identify the compromised host and quarantine it from the rest of the network to prevent lateral movement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully isolates the correct machine.

tasks.description: Initiate a forensic analysis of the quarantined host to identify the attacker's tools and techniques.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst begins the forensic process to understand the scope of the breach.
